item.title: 消息人士称，京东方工业集团将于下周启动首次公开募股，寻求最多 5 亿美元的投资
item.description: 三位知情人士周一透露，中国在线零售商京东商城（JD.com）旗下京东工业集团（JingDong Industrials）计划下周在香港进行首次公开募股，募集资金最多可达5亿美元。【原文：JingDong Industrials, a unit of Chinese online retailer JD.com , is planning to launch an initial public offering of up to $500 million in Hong Kong next week, three sources with knowledge of the deal said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国比特币采矿业无视 2021 年禁令，出现反弹
item.description: 矿工和行业数据显示，随着个人和企业矿工利用廉价电力和一些能源丰富省份的数据中心热潮，比特币挖矿在中国悄然卷土重来，尽管四年前就被禁止。【原文：Bitcoin mining is quietly staging a comeback in China despite being banned four years ago, as individual and corporate miners exploit cheap electricity and a data center boom in some energy-rich provinces, according to miners and industry data.】

item.title: 投资者称，必和必拓必须摆脱盎格鲁集团的影响，专注于增长项目
item.description: 投资者周一表示，必和必拓应摆脱英美资源集团，专注于其发展战略，因为澳大利亚公司在最后一刻向这家在伦敦上市的公司发出了呼吁，该公司即将与加拿大泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）达成价值 600 亿美元的合作。【原文：BHP should move on from Anglo American and focus on its growth strategy, investors said on Monday, after the Australian company's last-minute appeal to the London-listed firm that is nearing a $60 billion tie-up with Canada's Teck Resources.】

item.title: 俄罗斯顶级人工智能高管表示，新的人工智能俱乐部将赋予获胜者核动力
item.description: 俄罗斯一位顶级人工智能高管告诉路透社记者，人工智能将为那些能够引领技术发展的国家带来与核武器同等的巨大影响力，使其在 21 世纪占据优势地位。【原文：Artificial intelligence will bestow vast influence on a par with nuclear weapons to those countries who are able to lead the technology, giving them superiority in the 21st Century, one of Russia's top AI executive told Reuters.】

item.title: Prosus 半年度核心利润增长近一倍，原因是转向电子商务
item.description: 荷兰技术投资商 Prosus 周一公布，受数字服务和电子商务组合表现强劲的推动，其调整后核心利润激增 99%。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus on Monday reported a 99% surge in its adjusted core profit, driven by strong performances across its digital services and e-commerce portfolio.】

item.title: 威健将在 2031 年前向拉丁美洲娱乐业务投资 4.5 亿美元
item.description: 巴西天空电视台（Sky Brazil）和 DirecTV Latin America 的母公司、新成立的阿根廷怀肯公司（Waiken）周一表示，它将在 2031 年前投资 4.5 亿美元，以加强其在该地区的娱乐和电信业务。【原文：The newly formed Argentine-owned Waiken, parent company of Sky Brazil and DirecTV Latin America, said on Monday it will invest $450 million by 2031 to boost its entertainment and telecommunications business in the region.】

item.title: 从两周到两小时：人工智能如何重启英国经济
item.description: 中级会计师事务所摩尔-金斯顿-史密斯（Moore Kingston Smith）的会计师们开始使用人工智能来加快工作速度，利润率也随之跃升。【原文：When accountants at mid-tier firm Moore Kingston Smith began using artificial intelligence to speed up their work, profit margins jumped.】

item.title: 美国公司在气候谈判中坚守阵地，尽管有特朗普的存在
item.description: 尽管美国政府在 COP30 峰会召开前对全球气候议程感到失望，但美国公司并没有退缩。【原文：Despite the U.S. government souring on the global climate agenda ahead of the COP30 summit, American companies did not shy away.】

item.title: Shein 首家实体店凸显百货公司的生存之痛
item.description: Shein 进驻巴黎 BHV 旗舰店为百货公司的困境增添了政治色彩，因为购物者转向提供超快时尚的在线零售商，百货公司的生存正面临威胁。【原文：Shein's move into the flagship BHV in Paris has added political heat to the troubles of department stores, which are facing an existential threat from shoppers' shift to online retailers offering ultra-fast fashion.】

item.title: 欧盟敦促美国执行更多七月贸易协定，包括削减钢铁关税
item.description: 欧盟各国部长将于周一敦促美国高级贸易官员更多地执行 7 月份达成的欧盟-美国贸易协议，例如削减美国对欧盟钢铁征收的关税，取消对葡萄酒和烈酒等欧盟商品征收的关税。【原文：European Union ministers are set to urge top U.S. trade officials on Monday to apply more of the July EU-US trade deal, such as by cutting U.S. tariffs on EU steel and removing them for EU goods such as wine and spirits.】

item.title: 早间竞价假日周可能是日元干预的黄金时间
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 挪威财富税以百万富翁换平等
item.description: 坐在瑞士城市卢塞恩的湖畔别墅里，Borger Borgenhaug 怀念他的孙子孙女，怀念晴朗夏夜北欧大海的气息。【原文：Sitting in his lakeside villa in the Swiss city of Lucerne, Borger Borgenhaug misses his grandchildren and the smell of the Nordic sea on a clear summer night.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）从苹果新闻源中删除了相关报道
item.description: 据 Semafor 周日报道，美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）已从苹果新闻（Apple News）上删除了其报道，终止了与该平台的内容共享协议。【原文：CNN has removed its stories from Apple News, ending its content-sharing agreement with the platform, Semafor reported on Sunday.】

item.title: Nexperia 芯片危机如何再次颠覆汽车供应链
item.description: 中国南部工业区杂草丛生的地块旁的一家工厂已成为全球汽车芯片的咽喉要道，颠覆了这个几年前还信誓旦旦不会再受供应链中断影响的行业。【原文：A factory next to a weed-ridden lot in China's industrial south has become a global choke point for automotive chips, upending a sector that just a few years ago swore it wouldn't be caught again by supply-chain disruptions.】

item.title: 工会要求法官命令特朗普官员资助美国消费者监督机构
item.description: 一个联邦雇员工会周日要求联邦法官命令特朗普政府为美国最高消费者监督机构提供资金，几周前该机构曾表示其现金可能在年底用完。【原文：A federal employees' union on Sunday asked a federal judge to order the Trump administration to fund the top U.S. consumer watchdog, weeks after the agency said its cash could run out by year's end.】

item.title: 马来西亚称计划从 2026 年起禁止 16 岁以下青少年使用社交媒体
item.description: 马来西亚计划从明年起禁止 16 岁以下用户使用社交媒体，加入越来越多因担心儿童安全而选择限制访问数字平台的国家行列。【原文：Malaysia plans to ban social media for users under the age of 16 starting from next year, joining a growing list of countries choosing to limit access to digital platforms due to concerns about child safety.】

item.title: 乌克兰和谈接近达成解决方案，石油价格下跌
item.description: 油价周一下滑，延续了上周的跌势，原因是俄罗斯与乌克兰的和平谈判更接近于达成解决方案，而且美元走强。【原文：Oil prices slipped Monday, extending losses from last week, as Russia-Ukraine peace talks edged closer to a solution and the U.S. dollar strengthened.】

item.title: 在禁止青少年使用社交媒体之前，Snap 为澳大利亚人提供与银行挂钩的年龄证明工具
item.description: Snap 周一表示，它将为澳大利亚人提供通过该国银行拥有的软件验证年龄的机会，因为该互联网平台将遵守下个月生效的青少年社交媒体禁令。【原文：Snap said on Monday it will offer Australians the chance to verify their age with software owned by the country's banks as the internet platform complies with a teenage social media ban which takes effect next month.】

item.title: 交易员推高对美联储 12 月减息的押注，股市上涨
item.description: 本周一，全球股市事件频发，投资者对美联储将在 12 月降息的预期不断升温，尽管决策者在降息问题上仍存在分歧。【原文：Global stocks began an event-filled week on the front foot on Monday, as investors took heart from growing expectations of a Federal Reserve rate cut in December even as policymakers remain divided over such a move.】

item.title: 贸易部长：韩国认为在美国芯片关税问题上有与台湾合作的空间
item.description: 韩国贸易部长周一表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对芯片征收关税一事上，韩国认为与台湾存在合作空间。【原文：South Korea sees room for cooperation with Taiwan on U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on chips, the country's trade minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 日本 2026 年工资的早期迹象支持日本央行近期加息
item.description: 日本明年年度工资谈判的早期迹象表明，尽管面临美国关税带来的利润压力，日本仍将进行新一轮的稳健加薪，这也为日本央行进一步加息提供了支持。【原文：Early signs on Japan's annual wage negotiations for next year point to another round of solid pay hikes despite profit pressure from U.S. tariffs, bolstering the case for the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates further.】

item.title: 美元持稳，感恩节迫在眉睫，日元面临考验
item.description: 周一，美元持稳，交易商对日元的干预风险保持警惕，金边债券市场在英国预算案之前也处于紧张状态。【原文：The dollar was steady and traders wary on Monday as intervention risks swirled around the yen, with the gilt market on edge ahead of a British budget in a holiday-interrupted week where a New Zealand policy meeting is also expected to deliver a rate cut.】

item.title: 澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令促使内容创作者将目光投向国外
item.description: 澳大利亚是 YouTube 明星乔丹-巴克利（Jordan Barclay）的家乡，他在这里出生、上学，并在 23 岁时创建了一家价值 5000 万美元的公司，为 2300 万订阅者制作游戏内容。【原文：Australia is home for YouTube star Jordan Barclay, the place where he was born, went to school and built a company worth $50 million by age 23 that produces gaming content for 23 million subscribers.】

item.title: 中国希望在战略产业领域加强与德国的联系，以缓解稀土紧张局势
item.description: 中国在与德国新政府举行的最高级别会谈中提出了加强两国关系的主张，因为中国作为欧洲最大的贸易伙伴，正努力平息因稀土限制而导致的紧张局势，稀土限制扼杀了德国的生产线，并引发了去风险化的呼声。【原文：China pitched stronger ties in its highest‑level talks with Germany's new government as Beijing's top European trade partner seeks to smooth tensions over rare-earth curbs that have choked German production lines and prompted calls for de-risking.】

item.title: 必和必拓放弃英美模式，称自己的增长计划引人注目
item.description: 必和必拓集团周一表示，在与英美资源集团董事会进行初步讨论后，该公司不再寻求与英美资源集团合并的可能性。【原文：BHP Group said on Monday it is no longer pursuing a potential combination with Anglo American after preliminary discussions with Anglo's board.】

item.title: 麦格理提出以 74.9 亿美元的企业价值收购 Qube Holdings
item.description: Qube Holdings 周一表示，麦格理旗下的麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）提交了一份不具约束力的收购 Qube 全部股份的建议，包括债务在内，该物流公司的估值为 116 亿澳元（74.9 亿美元）。【原文：Qube Holdings said on Monday that Macquarie Asset Management, a unit of Macquarie , submitted a non-binding proposal to acquire all the shares of Qube, valuing the logistics firm at A$11.6 billion ($7.49 billion), including debt.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称蓝猫头鹰考虑重启私人信贷基金合并，但取决于基金股价
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，蓝猫王资本公司（Blue Owl Capital）正在考虑重启一项计划，如果规模较大的私募信贷基金的股价有所改善，该公司将合并旗下的两只私募信贷基金。【原文：Blue Owl Capital is considering reviving a plan to merge two of its private credit funds if the share price of the larger fund improves, as the alternative asset manager evaluates its options after facing investor backlash against the move last week, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Kohl's 将任命 Michael Bender 为永久首席执行官
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日援引一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，预计科尔公司最早将于下周一任命迈克尔-本德（Michael Bender）为其永久首席执行官。【原文：Kohl's Corp is expected to appoint Michael Bender as its permanent chief executive as early as Monday, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝森特告诉美国全国广播公司：美国经济整体上没有衰退风险
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周日表示，为期43天的政府停摆给美国经济造成了110亿美元的永久性打击，但鉴于利率放松和减税政策，他对明年的经济增长前景持乐观态度。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Sunday said the 43-day government shutdown caused an $11 billion permanent hit to the U.S. economy, but he was optimistic about growth prospects next year given easing interest rates and tax cuts.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，必和必拓再次向英美资源集团提出竞购要求
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，矿业集团必和必拓集团（BHP Group）再次向竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American）提出收购。【原文：Mining group BHP Group has made a renewed takeover approach to rival Anglo American , Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】
